RelatedSentence: NBC Montana stopped by an almost empty campus a few hours ago as some of the last few students were leaving their dorm rooms .
Some students call it bittersweet but they know they 'll be back for the fall .

It 's going to be great , said Andrew Guinn , a UM sophomore .
Yeah I 'm excited to leave Missoula but I 'm excited to leave to go home to Oregon .
I 'll be back in August , said Melissa Rutherford , a UM sophomore .
